trends: There have been no other sightings in Batroon

Summary: multiple UFO sigting in Batroon area in Lebanon
divs: Sighting Detailsi did not witness this in person, i heard this on a TV station called LBC, i didnt get the time of the event, they had a TV show and one of the guests was a female who said she witnessed an object in the sky in an area called Batroon located in the northern parts of Lebanon, circular in shape and had beamed light on her, she was very frightened and she said that the object emitted 4 beams of light all directed downwards, another witness said that the UFOs were more than a dozen in number, some people who attended a theater there went outside and witnessed the event, we are still waiting for something tonight over Beirut itself since a guy by the name of Mike Feghali who has a TV show on a local TV station called O TV, predicted that UFOs will appear over Beirut tonight Sep 21st 2009, we will keep an eye on the news since I'm working outside Lebanon so i can't physically be there, if such an incident will happen and is reported, i will record it and have it sent directly, i hope it does. PS: about 3 days ago local Tv stations have reported that 8 Israeli jet fighters were seen over the sky in Lebanon, i don't know if this is related but i wonder if they had seen these UFOs on their radar screen and have scrambled these jets to check what were they, as i said this was 3 or maybe 4 days ago before this incident, 8 jets is a high number usually they send 2 or 3 max since Lebanon is a small country
